information: Rixius AG is one of the leading manufacturers and retailers of glass packaging, plastic and tin plate in Germany. We supply glass bottles, plastic bottles, cans and much more. Our product portfolio of bottles, cans and buckets is rounded off with a range of suitable accessories that includes lids, caps, industrial sprayers, pumps, dispensers, etc. Our bottles and cans can be printed and labelled in house according to individual requirements. As a manufacturer and distribution partner, as well as due to the large scope of the market, we can manufacture products of optimum quality and price for our customers.
